creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: predominately pink due to bleeding; multicolored embroidery along shoulders and back; front and back have embroidered zoomorphic motifs including a four legged animal standing on its two back legs surrounded by several smaller animals; neck opening consists of vertical slit down front; made of four panels
title: Huipil
